## Types of Crises

::: {.fragment}
- [Banking Crisis]{.h}
    - Domino of bank collapse due to insolvency
:::

::: {.fragment}
- [Exchange Rate Crisis]{.h}
    - Unexpected collapse in value of developing country currency
:::

::: {.fragment}
- [(Sovereign) Debt Crisis]{.h}
    - EU debt crisis following public bailouts
:::

::: {.fragment}
- [Balance of Payments Crisis]{.h}
    - Foreign currency reserves drying up
:::
